```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE
)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(vegan)
library(stringr)
library(popPackage)
library(NMF)
library(umap)
library(RColorBrewer)

darkcols <- bigPalette
# choose different colors in orders

colorBlindBlack8  <- c("#000000", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9", "#CC79A7",
                                "#009E73",  "#F0E442", "#0072B2", "#D55E00")  
```

# Perez2022

```{r}
load("../../results/Perez2022/batch_meta.Rda")
levels(meta$disease_state)[which(levels(meta$disease_state) == "na")] = "normal"

load("../../results/pseudobulk/pseudobulk_perez.Rda")

meta$batch_id = paste0(meta$sample, "_", meta$Processing_Cohort)
meta <- meta[match(rownames(plot_df), meta$batch_id),]
plot_df = cbind(plot_df, meta)
plot_df$group = str_to_title(plot_df$group)
plot_df$disease_state = str_to_title(plot_df$disease_state)
```


```{r}
pdf("../../results/supplement/perez_pseu.pdf", width = 8, height = 6)

ggplot(plot_df, aes(x = PC_1, y = PC_2)) +
  geom_point(aes(col = disease_state, shape = Processing_Cohort), size = 4)+
  theme_bw()+
  theme(text = element_text(size = 25),
        axis.title.x = element_text(vjust = -1),
        plot.margin = unit(c(0.5,0.5,1,0.5),"cm"))+
  labs(color = "Condition", shape = "Batch")+
  xlab("PC1")+
  ylab("PC2")+
  scale_color_manual(values =colorBlindBlack8)
dev.off()
```






# COVID_143 data

```{r}
load("../../results/COVID_143/meta.Rda")
meta = unique(plot_df[,c("sample_id", "Status", "Site")])
load("../../results/pseudobulk/pseudobulk_update_sample.Rda")

plot_df$Site <- meta$Site[match(rownames(plot_df), meta$sample_id,)]
plot_df$group_id <- meta$Status[match(rownames(plot_df), meta$sample_id,)]

```


```{r}
pdf("../../results/supplement/covid_pseudobulk.pdf", width = 8, height = 6)

ggplot(plot_df, aes(x = PC_1, y = PC_2)) +
  geom_point(aes(shape = Site,
                 col = group_id), size =4) +
    theme_bw() +
    scale_shape_manual(values=c(16, 7,3))+
  theme(text = element_text(size = 25),
        axis.title.x = element_text(vjust = -1),
        plot.margin = unit(c(0.5,0.5,1,0.5),"cm"))+
  labs(color = "Status")+
  xlab("PC1")+
  ylab("PC2")+
  scale_color_manual(values =colorBlindBlack8)

dev.off()
```
